content.text: Match ends, Burnley 2, Bristol City 0.
Second Half ends, Burnley 2, Bristol City 0.
Attempt missed. Marlon Pack (Bristol City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Tendayi Darikwa (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Tendayi Darikwa (Burnley).
Bobby Reid (Bristol City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Josh Brownhill (Bristol City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jeff Hendrick (Burnley).
Attempt blocked. Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Burnley. Michael Kightly replaces Steven Defour.
Sam Vokes (Burnley) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the centre of the box following a set piece situation.
Foul by Aden Flint (Bristol City).
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Bristol City. Marlon Pack replaces Jens Hegeler.
Attempt missed. Tammy Abraham (Bristol City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt missed. Michael Keane (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Scott Golbourne.
Substitution, Burnley. Ashley Barnes replaces Scott Arfield.
Substitution, Burnley. Jeff Hendrick replaces Joey Barton.
Goal!  Burnley 2, Bristol City 0. Steven Defour (Burnley) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson.
